item.title: Working with many Linux groups
item.description:
The number-of-groups limitation - and how to work around it

Description  

On JASMIN, users are added to Linux groups for access to the group workspaces and CEDA datasets which they have registered to use, in addition to a couple of standard groups granted for all users.
